title: cmd/guru/guru.el
body:
I'm having an issue with the new way `guru.el` hooks in key bindings.

I get:

    Symbol's value as variable is void: go-guru-map

each time I try to load `guru.el` from the latest `master` (https://github.com/golang/tools/commit/b0452eeec4321022e8c7484acba84858c4e418bf that is)

Reverting to the previous `go-mode-map` additions fix the issue.

I'm using go1.6, Emacs 24.3.1 under Ubuntu 14.04.

/cc @alandonovan
